snippet: Goalie Braden Holtby, 22, who was playing for the Hershey Bears only a month ago, has given up only two goals in the first two games of Washington's taut series with Boston.
abstract: Goalie Braden Holtby, 22, who was playing for the Hershey Bears only a month ago, has given up only two goals in the first two games of Washington's taut series with Boston.

headline.main: Capitals Goalie Takes Rapid Rise Save by Save
